title: Properties Filter Filter
description: Configuration for the Okapi Properties Filter Filter

configurations.name: Java Properties (Output not escaped)
configurations.description: Java properties files (Characters in the output encoding are not escaped)
configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
useLD.b=true
localizeOutside.b=true
useKeyCondition.b=false
extractOnlyMatchingKey.b=true
keyCondition=.*text.*
extraComments.b=false
commentsAreNotes.b=true
escapeExtendedChars.b=false
useCodeFinder.b=true
codeFinderRules.count.i=4
codeFinderRules.rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]
codeFinderRules.rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v
codeFinderRules.rule2=\{\d.*?\}
codeFinderRules.rule3=\<(/?)\w+[^>]*?>
codeFinderRules.sample=%s, %d, {1}, \n, \r, \t, etc.
codeFinderRules.useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=true

configurations.name: Properties with complex HTML Content
configurations.description: Java Property content processed by an HTML subfilter
configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
useLD.b=true
localizeOutside.b=true
useKeyCondition.b=false
extractOnlyMatchingKey.b=true
keyCondition=.*text.*
extraComments.b=false
commentsAreNotes.b=true
escapeExtendedChars.b=false
useCodeFinder.b=true
codeFinderRules.count.i=3
codeFinderRules.rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]
codeFinderRules.rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v
codeFinderRules.rule2=\{\d.*?\}
codeFinderRules.sample=%s, %d, {1}, \n, \r, \t.
codeFinderRules.useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=true
subfilter=okf_html
